channel.title: Drugscape - Indev
channel.description:
[b][center][size=16pt]Drugscape[/size]
[u]Where you choose to either be a grower/dealer or a DEA (Drug Enforcement Agency) agent.[/u][/center]
[size=14pt]Playing a Grower/Dealer[/size]
How do you grow? Instead of making it a BS 1 minute way to make your drugs, I've gone ahead and looked up how to actually make them IRL, and turned that into the process. For example:
To make cocaine:
-Plant cocoa seeds -Harvest to get cocea leaves -Grind them to get cocaine paste -Add hydrochloric acid+water to the paste to get Impure cocaine -Add tampered ammonia to get Unfinished cocaine -Finally, add Potassium salt to get Cocaine (Pure)
To get the ingredients (Like hydrochloric acid+water and ammonia) is also another long process.
However, there are other simpler drugs that you can make, like weed.
Of course, the price varies from the amount of effort needed to get the drugs.
Then to sell, you'll have to look for NPCs that change location (every few days/hours/weeks?).
[size=14pt]Playing a DEA agent[/size]
You have the ability to ::search (player). If the player has drugs on them, you can either bust them and send them to jail (also you'll receive a reward) or try and bribe them. Now, there is no honour among thieves, so if he decides to turn you in, you'll lose your position as a DEA agent and go to jail too, so it's advised to always think twice who you're making deals with. And remember, a screenshot is worth a thousand words. :)
[size=16pt]Jail[/size]
I'm not sure what happens here yet. It might be the classic "Mine 250 silver ore", but I want to do something different
[size=16pt]Other things on the server[/size]
[size=14pt]Quests[/size]
These will involve drugs, of course.
[size=14pt]Boss'[/size]
I'll add armour, weapons, etc. that you'll be able to buy (with your hard earned DEA money, or your risky drug dealer cash (Not forgetting that special DEA discount :P)) and use on monsters to PvM
[size=14pt]PKing[/size]
Not sure If I'll make it a free for all FUN arena (Don't drop your items) or a dangerous one (Drop your items on death)
____
I've already started on this. Thoughts, suggestions, comments? :)

item.description:
@Mopar-Server wrote:

[quote=“RunescapeBR, post:16, topic:464780”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=568902.msg4129384#msg4129384 date=1350862335]
I’ve played a server based around drugs before… let me tell you how it went: make your fucking drugs, do your fucking drugs, log off. Why? Because there was nothing else to do but drugs.
[/quote]

Did you read my thread at all? Or did you assume that it was going to be the exact same as the server you played…

Don’t judge a server by its name(?)[/quote]

Lol.

Tbh it actually seems really fun i would play it

item.title: Drugscape - Indev
item.dc:creator: @RunescapeBR RunescapeBR
item.description:
@RunescapeBR wrote:

Well people wouldn’t be very eager to make drugs if all they got was 10k p/batch made

I was thinking of making it like 13M(?) p/ kg.

There would also be 100g, 200g, 500g and then finally 1kg. (You’d join them in a pot)

And also I’d have tickets that you could exchange 500M for.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugscape - Indev
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“RunescapeBR, post:12, topic:464780”]I was thinking of maybe setting up “Labs” for people to cook Meth, cocaine, etc. You’d have to pay a substancial (1B+?) fee, but it would be your own place. However, if the cops find it, it’ll be taken over and you’ll go to jail.

Thoughts?[/quote]
1b+? Goddamn. Don’t let you ever be in control of an economy… Hyper-inflation would be a serious prob.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugscape - Indev
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Some ideas, money can maybe buy you hookers? (NPCs that follow you around, can be placed in inventory and bank too), money can buy you a house, and maybe you can have a selection of different houses and stuff, and OH HERE’S A GREAT IDEA: You can have like day and night, and at day its harder to sell drugs cause there’s DEA people, and at night its easier cause there’s none but zombies start spawning at random times and shit.

^^ sorry for rambling

and the all out pvp worlds is great. 100% pvp all the time, makes it risky for you to sell drugs

Read full topic

item.title: Drugscape - Indev
item.dc:creator: @RunescapeBR RunescapeBR
item.description:
@RunescapeBR wrote:

Togasa:

Damn just a few days ago I was thinking about making something like this but it would kind of be pointless because the server would revolve around the drugs and once you’ve made them you’d get bored and want to stop playing. I think that is because I doubt there will be any good quality content besides the drugs to do afterwards.

That last thing you mentioned “I doubt there will be any good quality content besides the drugs” has really gotten me thinking WHAT I could possibly add to make the game more entertaining. I’ve come up with a few ideas:

-Factions/Turfs/Gang disputes for territory, etc
-DayZ based world (So you’d cook your drugs, and then you’d have to go into the larger cities (Varrock, Fally, etc) to try to sell them, while at the same time trying to avoid zombies (Seems like a silly idea to me, but hey, it just might work right?))
-All out PvP worlds (Kind of like an apocalypse)

It’s funny that you mention if I was drunk while making this… The original thought of making a drug based server did come to me while I was.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugscape - Indev
item.dc:creator: @RunescapeBR RunescapeBR
item.description:
@RunescapeBR wrote:

Well, if nothing else was added, there would be no point in producing drugs because you wouldn’t have anything to spend money on.

And I can guarentee the server would get boring after you reached a max cash stack.

The only way I can picture it being less boring, is if there were factions and “turfs”. That way players would not only battle the DEA, but other gangs too. But that would lead back to PvP lol. ^^

Read full topic
